elements.title: N661US (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that N661US (pictured) was the prototype Boeing 747-400 and was involved in the Northwest Airlines Flight 85 incident, in which the aircraft suddenly banked hard to the left in flight?

elements.title: Typhoon Wutip (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Typhoon Wutip in 2019 was the first recorded Category 5–equivalent tropical cyclone to occur in February in the Northern Hemisphere?

elements.title: Yudas Sabaggalet (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Yudas Sabaggalet, an Indonesian politician, worked in a Coca-Cola factory while studying at university?

elements.title: Destinies of the Soul (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Destinies of the Soul was the only book that contained human skin in the collection of Harvard University?

elements.title: Rainforest (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Clams Casino almost lost his EP Rainforest because his computer stopped working?

elements.title: William O. Raymond (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that William O. Raymond's 1905 Glimpses of the Past: History of the River St. John probably recorded the first known Black man in future New Brunswick?

elements.title: Forever Young (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Blackpink's "Forever Young" was heard being played from the group's agency's headquarters three years before it was released?

elements.title: Ukraina (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the residents of Ukraina and Gorham, North Dakota, were involved in a feud that started with Easter baskets?

elements.title: Lee I want to exclusively list my tribal name, my Bunun tribal name is Savungaz Valincinan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that an activist protested the use of Chinese characters for Taiwanese Indigenous names by changing her legal name to "Lee I want to exclusively list my tribal name, my Bunun tribal name is Savungaz Valincinan"?
